events.message: We have received the software engineer application from John Doe, expressing strong interest and relevant experience.
The application has been categorized under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like software and developer in the resume.
Recruiter Alice Smith has been assigned to handle the candidate's application following the initial categorization.
Completed the first screening interview to evaluate basic software development skills and cultural fit.
The candidate responded promptly to the screening feedback and expressed enthusiasm to move forward with the process.
Scheduled the technical interview with the software development team to assess coding and problem-solving abilities.
